headline: GM And Ford Brace For Worst Hit To Earnings From Trump Tariffs
summary: Trump tariffs over the weekend ignited a tit-for-tat trade war. But the U.S. said Monday that Mexico tariffs would be paused for a month.

raw.headline: GM And Ford Brace For Worst Hit To Earnings From Trump Tariffs
